property.name: Type

property.name: Subname
property.value: Eternal Night

property.name: Traits
property.value: Alicorn, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. Your Troublemakers here have Villain and have their total power tripled. At the end of your turn, if you control at least 2 face-up Troublemakers, turn this card over.

property.name: Type
property.value: Mane Character Boosted

property.name: Subname
property.value: Eternal Night

property.name: Traits
property.value: Alicorn, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. Your Troublemakers here have Villain and have their total power tripled. At the end of your turn, for each opposing player who controls no ready Friends, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. This card can't leave play or lose abilities. Main Phase: Pay 6 points to put an Element Friend from a discard pile or banished zone into play. Use this ability only once per turn. Any Challenger may use this ability.

card.name: The Stars Will Aid In Her Escape

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem becomes solved, you may search your deck for a Nightmare Moon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Troublemaker here, you may banish a non-Unique Friend.

card.name: The Night is Dark and Full of Terrors

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time each turn one or more Friends become frightened, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you lose a Troublemaker faceoff, your charactes here gain Competitive 3 until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may pay X AT less to play your first Friend each turn, where X is the number of frightened Friends in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move one of your charactes to this Problem, you may exhaust that character to move an opposing character here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique Friends and Resources lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card on the bottom of your Problem deck. When this Problem enters play, your opponents lose the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may skip your first turn. If you do, turn your Mane Character over and choose a color and put a 2 power colorless Changeling Friend token with that color into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your Friends would leave play, you may exhaust your Mane Character instead.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Generosity

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may unfrighten one of your Friends here.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Magic

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may pay 2 points. If you do, choose one: Search your deck for a Resource, reveal it, and put it into your hand, or put a Resource from your hand into play.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Honesty

property.name: Text
property.value: When one or more of your Friends becomes frightened, you may pay 1AT to move another of your Friends.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Kindness

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have at least 8 points, opposing Troublemakers here lost and can't have abilities.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Loyalty

property.name: Text
property.value: The first time the Challengers confront this Problem, they may pay half their points, rounded up. If they do, the Challengers take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: ProblemPlayerElement1
property.value: Not Laughter

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may put a 1 [Generosity] Unicorn Friend token with Prepared, a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token, or a 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend token with Swift into play here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the Challengers confront this Problem, they may look at the top card of a Problem deck, then put it on the top or bottom of that Problem deck.

property.name: Type
property.value: Mane Character

property.name: Subname
property.value: Crystal Tyrant

property.name: Traits
property.value: Unicorn, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. During Faceoffs, your Crystal Friends here have Competitive X, where X is the number of your Crystal Friends here. At the start of a Problem Faceoff involving this card, turn this card over.

property.name: Type
property.value: Mane Character Boosted

property.name: Subname
property.value: Crystal Tyrant

property.name: Traits
property.value: Unicorn, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit 7

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. Your Crystal Friends here have Competitive X, where X is the number of your Crystal Friends here. The first time you win a faceoff each turn, you may dismiss a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card attached to your Mane Character. This card can't leave play or lose abilities. Main Phase: Exhaust this card to choose one of your Friends. That Friend is also Crystal and gains Teamwork until the end of your opponents' next turn. At the start of your turn, put a 2 power colorless Crystal Friend token into play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 6. Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Mane Character has Prepared.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 6.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem leaves play, you may put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 7.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, you may search your deck for a card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 7.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, you may move one of your characters. If you control Princess Cadance, you may move up to two of your characters instead.

card.name: Unlocking the Love in Their Hearts

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 8.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the Challengers confront this Problem for the first time, banish all Crystal Friend tokens.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, the Challengers win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, the Challengers lose the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Friends can't leave play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play your first Event each turn, you may frighten one of your Friends. If you do, you may return that Event from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Score Phase, you may banish one of your Resources. If you do, choose a Problem and exhaust all Friends there with cost 2 or less.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Harmonious 6.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Main Phase, you may exhaust one of your Friends at home. If you do, your Friends at this Problem get +1 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 3. Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, for each opponent, dismiss one of that opponent's Friends.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Mane Character has +2 Power for each opponent who has at least 1 Friend in their discard pile.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, you may retire any number of Friends. For each Friend retired this way, you gain 1AT, and each opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend is dismissed, you may pay 2AT. If you do, put that Friend into play under your control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move your Mane Character to this Problem, you may move any number of your Crystal Friend from the same location to the same Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, the Villain wins the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, the Villain loses the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem enters play, each opponent reveals their hand. You may choose up to one Friend, Event, Resource, and Troublemaker revealed this way and banish them. Draw a card for each card banished this way.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play cards from your discard pile as though they were in your hand. If a card would enter your discard pile from anywhere, banish it instead.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each opponent's maximum hand size is reduced by the number of Resources they control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Tyrannical 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Troublemaker Phase, you may discard a random card. If you do, choose one: turn a Troublemaker face-down, or exhaust an opposing character.

property.name: Type
property.value: Mane Character

property.name: Subname
property.value: Behaving Oddly

property.name: Traits
property.value: Changeling, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. If you would put one or more token Friends into play, put that many 2 power colorless Changeling Friend tokens into play instead. At the end of your Main Phase, if you have 5 Army counters on The Hive, you may turn this card over.

property.name: Type
property.value: Mane Character Boosted

property.name: Subname
property.value: Eternal Night

property.name: Traits
property.value: Changeling, Royalty

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Home Limit on the Hive? Hahahaa!

property.name: Text
property.value: You gain an additional 2AT during your Action Step, and draw an extra card during your Draw Step. If you would put one or more token Friends into play, put that many 2 power colorless Changeling Friend tokens into play instead. At the end of your turn, choose another character. This card gains the printed abilities of that character until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. Immediate: Turn this card over, reveal the named Friend and Challenger, and gain control of at least one Friend with that name from that Challenger to search that Challenger's hand, deck and discard pile for any Friends with the same name and banish them beneath The Hive.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Friend: Challenger: At the end of your turn, if you do not control the named Friend, you may put a Friend with that name from beneath The Hive into play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. Immediate: Turn this card over, reveal the named Friend and Challenger, and gain control of at least one Friend with that name from that Challenger to search that Challenger's hand, deck and discard pile for any Friends with the same name and banish them beneath The Hive.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Friend: Challenger: At the end of your turn, if you do not control the named Friend, you may put a Friend with that name from beneath The Hive into play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. Immediate: Turn this card over, reveal the named Friend and Challenger, and gain control of at least one Friend with that name from that Challenger to search that Challenger's hand, deck and discard pile for any Friends with the same name and banish them beneath The Hive.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Friend: Challenger: At the end of your turn, if you do not control the named Friend, you may put a Friend with that name from beneath The Hive into play.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Location, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. When a Friend enters play, put an Army counter on this card. Then, if this card has 60 or more Army counters on it, you win the game. When one of your Friends that you do not own named by a Changeling Spy leaves play or is frightened, that Friend is banished beneath The Hive.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Resource, Asset, Permanent

property.name: Text
property.value: Start the game with this card at your home. When you score one or more points, put that many Strength counters on this card. Then, if this card has 30 or more Strength counters on it, you win the game. Immediate: Exhaust this card, reveal the named Event, and remove a number of Strength counters from this card equal to the printed cost of that Event to play a copy of that Event for free, obeying timing phrases.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Text
property.value: During faceoffs here, you have +2 power for each of your Changeling characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your opponent plays an Event, you may remove a number of Army counters from The Hive equal to that Event's cost to copy its effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't move characters unless they pay 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opposing Friend enters play at a Problem for the first time each turn, you may put a Friend with the same cost from your hand into play at that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opposing characters here lose and can't have abilities.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Starting Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may skip your first turn. If you do, turn your Mane Character over or choose a color and put a 2 power colorless Changeling Friend token with that color into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, the Challengers look at an opponent's hand and choose a card. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Friends entering play here do not cause Army Counters to be put on The Hive.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, the Challengers choose a color. Your Friends with that color cost 1AT less to play, to a minimum of 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this problem becomes solved, dismiss all opposing token Friends.
